TopicTitle: Ship icons don't show on map?

Articles.Content:
Nvm, found the problem. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T17:07:30Z" title="06/04/2015 05:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by SmashingKirby148**

I'd wager dollars to donuts that you aren't tracking those vessel types. Move your mouse cursor to the upper center of your screen while in map view. A box should drop down with a bunch of different icons, indicating what you are tracking. If you cant click on it, first click on one of the KER windows then back on the game screen and try again.

> 
> I'd wager dollars to donuts that you aren't tracking those vessel types. Move your mouse cursor to the upper center of your screen while in map view. A box should drop down with a bunch of different icons, indicating what you are tracking. If you cant click on it, first click on one of the KER windows then back on the game screen and try again.

...OMG, you are right. I'm so dumb! xD I clicked off the other icons to delete debris, but I forgot to put it back! XD
